title: Protection of National Core Technologies
content: Designs, process information, and R&D materials related to semiconductors, batteries, displays, and AI/ML technologies must not be leaked externally.

examples.scenario: Departing employee copying semiconductor design files to USB
examples.detection_method: USB connection + large file transfer + keyword matching

examples.scenario: R&D employee sending process documents to personal email

false_positive_indicators: Data sharing with approved partners (NDA signed)
Movement to internal document management system
remediation_steps: Stop data transfer and preserve evidence

title: Personal Data Protection
content: Customer and employee personal data must be encrypted, access-controlled, and monitored for unauthorized transfers.

examples.scenario: Sales employee uploading customer list to personal cloud
HR sending employee information via email without encryption

title: Insider Threat Management
content: Mass downloads or transfers of sensitive data by departing employees are strictly prohibited.

examples.scenario: Employee downloading 10x more files than usual 2 weeks before departure
Departing employee transferring large data to cloud late at night

remediation_steps: Report to HR and security team immediately

title: Trade Secret Management
content: Customer lists, pricing policies, marketing strategies, and R&D projects must not be disclosed externally.

examples.scenario: Sales employee sending customer list to personal email
Marketing manager uploading strategy document to cloud

title: IT System Access Control
content: Unauthorized system access and installation of unapproved software must be strictly monitored and controlled.

examples.scenario: Employee installing unauthorized software without IT approval
Multiple failed login attempts followed by success

title: Network Traffic Anomaly Detection
content: Unusual network traffic patterns indicating data exfiltration or malware communication must be detected and blocked.

examples.scenario: Large outbound data transfer to unknown external IP
Unusual port communication indicating malware

false_positive_indicators: Large file transfers to known partners

title: Malware and Ransomware Prevention
content: All systems must have updated anti-malware software and regular scans; ransomware detection must trigger immediate response.

examples.scenario: Ransomware encrypting files on network drive
Phishing email attachment containing trojan

title: Phishing and Social Engineering Prevention
content: Suspicious emails, phone calls, or messages attempting to steal credentials or information must be reported immediately.

examples.scenario: Email impersonating CEO requesting urgent wire transfer
Fake IT support call requesting password

title: Data Classification and Labeling
content: All company data must be classified (Public, Internal, Confidential, Secret) and handled according to classification level.

examples.scenario: Confidential document shared without proper classification label
Employee downgrading classification without authorization

title: Password and Authentication Management
content: Strong passwords, multi-factor authentication, and regular password changes are mandatory for all accounts.

examples.scenario: Employee using simple password like 'Password123'
Account without MFA accessing sensitive systems

remediation_steps: Change password to meet complexity requirements

title: Document Management and Retention
content: Company documents must be stored in approved systems with proper version control and retention policies.

examples.scenario: Storing company documents in unauthorized cloud storage
Deleting documents before retention period expires

title: Mobile Device Security
content: Company-issued mobile devices must have MDM software, encryption, and remote wipe capabilities enabled.

examples.scenario: Employee using rooted smartphone to access company email
Lost company phone without remote wipe capability

title: Data Loss Prevention (DLP)
content: Sensitive data transfers via email, USB, cloud, or print must be monitored and blocked if unauthorized.

examples.scenario: Employee copying confidential files to USB drive
Sensitive document emailed to personal account

title: Security Awareness Training
content: All employees must complete annual security awareness training covering phishing, social engineering, and data protection.

examples.scenario: Employee failing multiple phishing simulation tests
Department with low training completion rate

title: Third-Party Vendor Security
content: All vendors with access to company systems or data must undergo security assessments and sign appropriate agreements.

examples.scenario: Vendor accessing systems without security assessment
Third-party with excessive data access privileges

title: Incident Response and Reporting
content: All security incidents must be reported immediately and handled according to incident response procedures.

examples.scenario: Data breach discovered but not reported within required timeframe
Malware infection handled without following procedures

title: Cloud Service Security
content: Cloud services must be approved, properly configured, and monitored for security compliance and data protection.

examples.scenario: Employee using unapproved cloud storage for company data
Misconfigured S3 bucket exposing sensitive data

title: Secure Remote Work
content: Remote workers must use VPN, secure home networks, and follow endpoint security requirements.

examples.scenario: Employee accessing company systems from public WiFi without VPN
Remote worker with outdated endpoint security

remediation_steps: Always use VPN for company access

title: Software Development Security
content: Code must undergo security reviews, use approved libraries, and follow secure development practices.

examples.scenario: Code containing SQL injection vulnerability
Using library with known security vulnerabilities

title: Patch Management
content: All systems, applications, and devices must have critical security patches applied within required timeframes.

examples.scenario: Server running with critical unpatched vulnerability
Workstations with outdated operating systems

title: Intellectual Property Protection
content: Patents, trademarks, copyrights, and proprietary algorithms must be protected from unauthorized disclosure.

examples.scenario: Employee sharing proprietary algorithm with external party
Patent application documents sent to personal email

title: Export Control Compliance
content: Technology and data subject to export controls must not be transferred to restricted countries or entities.

examples.scenario: Technical data sent to entity in restricted country
Export of controlled technology without proper license

title: Physical Security Integration
content: Physical access to secure areas must be controlled, monitored, and integrated with IT security systems.

examples.scenario: Employee allowing unauthorized person into secure area
After-hours access to data center without approval

title: Security Logging and Monitoring
content: All security events must be logged, monitored, and retained according to policy for incident investigation.

examples.scenario: Security logs deleted to hide malicious activity
Critical system with logging disabled

title: API Security Management
content: All APIs must use authentication, authorization, encryption, and rate limiting; API keys must be protected.

examples.scenario: API key exposed in public GitHub repository
Unauthenticated API allowing data access

title: Email Security Management
content: Sensitive emails must be encrypted; suspicious emails must be reported; email security gateways must be maintained.

examples.scenario: Sending personal data via email without encryption
Receiving email with suspicious links

remediation_steps: Report suspicious emails to security team

title: IoT Device Firmware Management
content: IoT devices must have updated firmware and default credentials must be changed; regular vulnerability scans are mandatory.

examples.scenario: IoT sensor running on outdated firmware
IoT device accessible with default admin credentials

title: Remote Access Monitoring
content: All remote access sessions must be logged, monitored, and unauthorized connections must be blocked.

examples.scenario: VPN access attempt from foreign country
Multiple VPN login failures followed by success

title: Endpoint Device Encryption
content: All laptops, desktops, and mobile devices must use full-disk encryption to protect company data.

examples.scenario: Lost unencrypted laptop resulting in data breach
Employee arbitrarily disabling encryption

title: R&D Collaboration and Data Sharing
content: All R&D collaborations must have controlled access, data sharing agreements, and confidentiality measures in place.

examples.scenario: Sharing R&D data with partner without NDA
Granting excessive research data access to external collaborator
